description:
Kenshiro bears heavy damage from his fight with Kaioh. Under the pretext of giving Akashachi a burial at sea, Shachi seeks to withdraw and give Kenshiro a chance to heal. Kaioh returns to prevent that, and as Shachi`s group starts down the waterway, Kaioh once again appears before them! Is this the end of the line!? Shachi is ready to throw in the towel, but suddenly, Kaioh`s evil fighting spiritual energy gets extinguished. Kenshiro, whose pulse should have stopped, stands before them...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaioh`s Declaration of Victory! The Phantom of the North Star Attacks!!
Victoire éphémère pour Kaio ! L`esprit du Hokuto lui fait face !!
カイオウつかの間の勝利宣言! 北斗の幻が彼を襲う!!
